tool_description: Validates and standardizes legal citations according to Bluebook or other specified citation formats, correcting common errors and formatting issues.

citations.description: Array of legal citations to validate and format

error_messages: Empty citation array: Provide at least one citation to validate
Invalid citation format preference: Use one of [bluebook, alwd, local]
Unparseable citation: One or more citations are too malformed to parse and correct
Maximum citations exceeded: Limit validation requests to 100 citations at once
usage: Provide array of citations and optionally specify citation_format. Returns validated citations with correction notes and validity status.

validation_status.description: Status for each citation: valid, corrected, invalid

correction_notes.description: Notes describing corrections made to each citation
